node.name: Typedef
node.description: definition of a user defined type

attribute.name: Used
attribute.description: only for ST_condfun, ST_dofun und ST_whilefun

attribute.name: Ext_Assigns
attribute.description: only for ST_condfun, ST_dofun und ST_whilefun

attribute.name: Int_Assign
attribute.description: only for ST_condfun, ST_dofun und ST_whilefun

attribute.name: Reference
attribute.description: List of artificial return values which correspond to reference parameters

attribute.name: String
attribute.description: In case of constant character arrays defined as strings, this attribute holds the original definition

node.name: Ok
node.description: Dummy node, last declared in node_info.mac

attribute.name: Indent_Before
attribute.description: the default value has to be fixed!

attribute.name: Indent_After
attribute.description: the default value has to be fixed!

node.name: CSEInfo
node.description: This node is not located in the AST, it is only used internally by CSE.

attribute.name: Static
attribute.description: This flag is used to distinguish between static spmd-blocks, i.e. the decision whether to execute in parallel or not is done at compile time, and dynamic ones.

attribute.name: First
attribute.description: Flag whether the sync-region is the first one of the current SMPD-region

attribute.name: Last
attribute.description: Flag whether the sync-region is the last one of the current SMPD-region

attribute.name: Code
attribute.description: if present, the used counter for the code should be increased which is not done yet
